instructions: Open WhatsApp from the app drawer or home screen. Select the action overflow menu (three vertical dots on the top right corner). Hit Settings . How to enable two-factor authentication in WhatsApp for Android Source: Harish Jonnalagadda / Android Central Tap Account . Select Two-step verification . Hit Enable to set up a PIN. How to enable two-factor authentication in WhatsApp for Android Source: Harish Jonnalagadda / Android Central Enter your six-digit PIN . Add an email address that will be used to reset your PIN should you forget it. Confirm your email address and hit Done to finish.
